lines: #GO ON A DATE/HAVE AN EXPERIENCE WITH YOUR PRESENT PARTNER
I'm sorry, but presently you don't have a relationship.
There are none of these experiences you can do right now.

According to your past relationship behavior, you are involved in a serious relationship. Choosing to continue from here means that you are willing to cheat, risk losing your partner and suffer the emotional consequences of
the breakup. Do you want to continue?
Where would you like to meet this person?
#SOME PLACE OTHER THAN WORK OR NEIGHBORHOOD

*comment @SLS|He is the head of accounting for an organization with which you are involved.|He is an efficiency expert hired by your organization to increase productivity.|He is a hairdresser at a boutique near work.|
*set dss "He is the head of accounting for an organization with which you are involved."
*set dss "He is an efficiency expert hired by your organization to increase productivity."
*set dss "He is a hairdresser at a boutique near work."

*comment @SLS|He shops in the same supermarket where you shop.|He helped you out to your car with some heavy packages and struck up a conversation with you.|He is a police officer who frequently patrols your area.|
*set dss "He shops in the same supermarket where you shop."
*set dss "He helped you out to your car with some heavy packages and struck up a conversation with you."
*set dss "He is a police officer who frequently patrols your area."

*comment @SLS|You were introduced by a mutual friend.|He is a salesperson who tried to sell you some real estate but became interested in you, instead.|He placed an interesting classified ad in the "Singles" column of the local newspaper.|
*set dss "You were introduced by a mutual friend."
*set dss "He is a salesperson who tried to sell you some real estate but became interested in you, instead."
*set dss "He placed an interesting classified ad in the \"Singles\" column of the local newspaper."
Whom would you like to meet?
You have chosen to meet with ${loverName}. His characteristics may be described as follows:
You meet ${loverName} in the following way:
After meeting him, the two of you discuss the possibility a date.
Unfortunately, you don't have the social skills necessary to convince this person that you are worth going out with.
The two of you agree that it might be nice to spend some time together.
Unfortunately, this person is not as interested in you as he first seemed.
Your husband finds out you have been "on the prowl" and leaves you.
Your husband doesn't find out about this relationship (for now).
You were caught trying to weasel your way into another relationship.
Your old boyfriend dumps you. Now you have no one!
Both men dump you. Now you have no one!
Your old boyfriend dumps you. You still have ${loverName}.
You're obviously upset and confused! You don't have a boyfriend to break up with.
Even though you have chosen to break off this relationship, it will still have an impact on you personally. Please check the status screen to see what adjustments have been made.
You don't even have a boyfriend!
You already have a steady partner!
You and ${loverName} make a handsome couple.
${loverName} doesn't want to get serious right now. Sorry.
Didn't you notice the other toothbrush and the extra laundry? You are already living together!
It would probably be a better idea if you were at least going steady first.
What! Are you kidding? BEING MARRIED AND LIVING TOGETHER WITH SOMEONE AT THE SAME TIME?? Your Physical sphere is not strong enough to manage an arrangement like this!
After thinking it over, ${loverName} agrees and you move in together.
${loverName} feels he really doesn't think he could do this right now; he isn't ready to give up his privacy.
